creditline: Gift of Gayle Rodda Kurtz in memory of Bill Olander
description: intricate line drawing in colored pastel pigments of red, yellow, purple, pink green and orange as well as pencil; purple 'railroad track' forming an arch in the LRQ and moving upward into URQ; roughly sketched root vegetables in LRQ; several small profile views of faces scattered throughout, some with more detail than others; lines, dots and swirls compose intricate vignettes throughout
provenance: Gayle Rodda Kurtz, New York; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: LRC, in red pencil: Roy DE FOREST | 1967
title: Untitled (Doodles)
